overview:
Dickey has over 20 years of experience in the software industry and is responsible for engineering, architecture, quality and cloud operations at Replay Solutions.

His core competencies include SaaS experience in multiple companies, where he focused on scalability, usability, performance, efficiency, reliability and maintainability of various successful software products. Prior to joining Replay Solutions, he was VP of Engineering at MarketTools, and before that he was VP of Engineering at CustomerSat (now MarketTools), where he was responsible for Engineering, SaaS operations and Technical Services.

Prior to CustomerSat he was VP of Engineering and Technology at Spear Technologies (now Infor), a leader in enterprise and mobile applications for the transportation industry. Before Spear, Dickey was a Director of Software Development at @Road (now Trimble) and developed solutions for the mobile resource management industry by combining GPS, wireless, Internet, voice, and ASP technologies. Prior to @Road, he has held management and R&D positions with Baan Research (now Infor), Nortel Networks and SPSS Inc.

He started his career with Tata Consultancy Services. He graduated magna cum laude with a BE/BS in Computer Engineering from the University of Pune.

image.attribution: Dickey Singh / Replay Solutions
